meanings.sent1: She is the sniffliest person in the class during allergy season.
meanings.sent2: The little girl with the sniffliest nose always carries tissues.
meanings.sent3: The sniffliest puppy in the litter was named Sneezy.
meanings.sent4: Her sniffliest moments always coincide with the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent5: The sniffliest kitten in the shelter found a loving home.

meanings.definition: In a manner characterized by frequent sniffles.
meanings.sent1: He sniffliest sniffled his way through the sad movie.
meanings.sent2: She sniffliest sniffled while walking in the cold wind.
meanings.sent3: The comedian pretended to be the sniffliest superhero in his act.
meanings.sent4: The wind whispered through the trees sniffliest on that autumn evening.
meanings.sent5: The baby elephant trumpeted sniffliest as it played in the water.
